meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of <radical>alligators</radical>... she's no ordinary leader, that's for sure. She's not a politician.. she's not a queen... She's one of the <kanji>Other</kanji> Ones, a group of strange, eccentric people who become leaders of animals.
readingMnemonic:
To remember the reading た, we use the word "Taco"

Then there's the <kanji>other</kanji>s of the others. These are the <reading>ta</reading>co (た) worshipers. They're really strange.
